name: GUOWU WEI
expertise:
**Dr. Guowu Wei**, a **Reader in Robotics** at the **University of Salford**, has made significant contributions to the field.

    1. **Research Interests**:
       - Dr. Wei's work spans several areas:
         - **Bio-robotics**: Investigating the interface between robotics and biology.
         - **Assistive Robotics**: Developing technologies to assist individuals with disabilities.
         - **General Robotics and Mechatronics**: Exploring fundamental principles in robotics.
         - **Manipulation and Grasping**: Studying how robots interact with objects.
         - **Rehabilitation and Prosthetics**: Enhancing rehabilitation processes.
         - **Reconfigurable Mechanisms and Robotics**: Designing adaptable robotic systems.
         - **Origami-inspired Mechanisms and Robotics**: Drawing inspiration from origami for innovative designs¹.
    
    2. **Research Accomplishments**:
       - Dr. Wei has an impressive track record:
         - **150+ peer-reviewed publications**
         - **20+ patents**
         - Research funded by **EPSRC**, **EU-FP7**, **ICUK**, **NSFC**, and the **Royal Academy of Engineering**.
         - Editorial roles in journals such as **Robotica**, **J Mech. Eng. Sci.**, and as an Associate Editor for **ICRA** and **IROS**.
         - **Deputy Chair of IFToMM MO U.K.**
         - Supervised and co-supervised **27 PhDs** and **12 PDRAs and visiting scholars**.
         - Recipient of **17 awards** from academic bodies, conferences, and journals¹.
    
    For more details, explore his profile on the [University of Salford website](https://www.salford.ac.uk/our-staff/guowu-wei)¹. You can also find his contributions on [IEEE Xplore](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/author/37086356029)² and [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.gr/citations?user=fITnUl8AAAAJ&hl=en)³.
    
    Source:
    (1) Guowu Wei | University of Salford. https://www.salford.ac.uk/our-staff/guowu-wei.
    (2) Guowu Wei | IEEE Xplore Author Details. https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/author/37086356029.
    (3) ‪Guowu Wei‬ - ‪Google Scholar‬. https://scholar.google.gr/citations?user=fITnUl8AAAAJ&hl=en.
